title: Teemo Combat Roll
body: I think Teemo should get a combat roll as his W. I did hear today about the upcoming changes which sounds interesting, but i think he needs some kind of dodge/escape, which i think a combat roll would fit his lifestyle.{{champion:17}}

replies.body: Only if he can roll sideways like a greased hamster on a bumpy slide.
Should roll towards your mouse location
A gerbal with a combat role....wtf is this G-Force?? l0l
I like the idea, i want teemo to be more skillbased, he is so straight forwards. A roll (like a dodge abb) would make him better and more fun.
